mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_code, c.member_code, c.quantity, g.goods_name, g.price, g.thumb_image FROM cart c JOIN goods g ON c.goods_code = g.goods_code WHERE c.member_code = #{memberCode}
select * from likes where member_code = #{memberCode} and goods_code = #{goodsCode}
mapper.delete: delete from likes where goods_code = #{goodsCode} and member_code = #{memberCode}
